pattern.current_behavior: Sequential tool execution in all observed sessions
pattern.opportunity: Add parallel execution guidance to agent prompts for independent operations
pattern.proposed_change: Enhance agent definitions to explicitly instruct parallel execution patterns: (1) multiple file reads in same message, (2) multiple Glob patterns in same message, (3) background Task spawning for independent work units. This reduces session time and token usage.

raw_evidence.description: No observed parallel tool execution despite Claude Code supporting parallel calls. Sessions with multiple independent Read operations (e.g., session 281ffece with 191 calls) executed them sequentially.
raw_evidence.philosophy_gap: Underutilizes 'Claude handles how' in strategic abstraction - execution strategy is suboptimal
